comment: If ` E ` is in the set generated by the Caratheodory's method, then it splits any set ` A ` in two parts such that the sum of the outer measures of the two parts is equal to the outer measure of the whole set ` A ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
